actions.description: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.
actions.name: Poisonous Pistol

actions.description:
The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12) It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dancing lights

1/day each: darkness, faerie fire, levitate (self only)
actions.name: Innate Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Fey Ancestry

specialTraits.description: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on the drow's ranged attack rolls with a pistol. In addition, the drow ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with a pistol.
specialTraits.name: Gunslinger

specialTraits.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
specialTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
